data.title: Battle of the Network Stars/November 18, 1978
data.meta_description: This edition's co-host was Frank Gifford. Gabe Kaplan (Captain of ABC) has appeared in all 5 Battles LeVar Burton is the first celebrity to appear on two different networks (Battle 2 on ABC with Roots Battle 5 on CBS with One In A Million: The Ron LaFlore Story) Baseball Dunk returned and...
